lore: There is a common misconception in Rodia that the Phobos Banshee feeds on the fear of other creatures. This rumor was initially spread by a doctor in Neralim after she realized how scared people were of the creature. When the doctor's colleagues found out what she was doing, they started to imitate her, and in a few years people went from running away from this Banshee to getting close to her, feeling more relaxed thanks to the placebo effect.
menagerieDialog: (It remains motionless despite your approach, donning an aura of inscrutable mystery.)
(The emotional instability of this creature is truly a sight to behold. If it's not screaming at inanimate objects, it's crying in a corner.)
(Why is this creature always crying? It's almost as if it refuses to ever be happy.)
Let my cries chill the living.
(She's crying, as usual. Perhaps someday you'll find a way to cheer her up.)
name: Phobos Banshee
